meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Robert Zimmerman Sue Carey Peggi Malys Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1010.

td.p: Robert Zimmerman, a geophysicist originally from the Bronx, New York
Sue Carey, a computer consultant from Walnut Creek, California (whose 1-day cash winnings total $15,400)
Peggi Malys, a medical student from Orlando, Florida (whose 2-day cash winnings total $25,200)

tr.td: HISPANIC AMERICA
BROADWAY LYRICS
IDAHO
TV TRIVIA
RHYMING PAIRS
PLASTICS
